A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Having seen The Last Jedi 5 times so far I can only say this film is totally awesome. It stays true to the Star Wars univers while taking it in a new direction. I have been a fan since the beginning and I love the direction it is heading. Having avoided all the spoilers and seeing it totally fresh it was full of shocks and surprises plus some great acting performances too. I totally enjoyed it from the opening crawl to the end credits. Well done Rian Johnson and the whole team at  Lucasfilm
